clinical_study.brief_title: Epidemiology and Treatment Patterns of Paediatric PAH (Pulmonary Arterial Hypertension)
clinical_study.official_title: Study to Estimate the Incidence and Prevalence and Treatment Patterns of Pediatric Pulmonary Hypertension in the US

brief_summary.textblock: To describe the prevalence, incidence and current treatment and procedures patterns in a US pediatric population with PAH in MarketScan database during the period 2010-2013

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence rate of PAH (pulmonary arterial hypertension)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Retrospective analysis of three year period
Retrospective analysis of three year period

secondary_outcome.measure: Assigned drug treatment for PAH measured using the MarketScan database
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Retrospective analysis of three year period
secondary_outcome.description: Description of pulmonary hypertension-targeted drugs prescribed in the study population and changes during the study period

secondary_outcome.measure: Diagnostic procedures performed among PAH patients measured using the MarketScan database
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Retrospective analysis of three year period

secondary_outcome.measure: Prevalence of comorbidities among PAH patients
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Retrospective analysis of three year period

arm_group.description: US pediatric population with PAH in MarketScan database during the period 2010-2013

intervention.description: As assigned by treating physician; may include following product classes: - Calcium channel blockers/antagonists - Prostanoids (prostaglandins, thromboxanes, prostacyclines) - Endothelin receptor antagonists - PDE-5 inhibitors - SGc stimulators

study_pop.textblock: The study population will be all patients who were born after 1991 and thus under the age of 18 during the years 2010 to 2013 in the MarketScan data. The larger population of patients under age 18 will comprise the general population from which population-based prevalence rates will be derived.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- All PAH patients who were in the MarketScan database and who were under age 18 at some time during the years 2010 through 2013
